content.rendered:
Directed by Sasi.

Written by Sasi.

Cast Vijay Antony(Arul Selvakumar). Satna Titus(Magizhini). Bagavathi Perumal(Rajesh). Muthuraman(Arul’s Uncle). Dheepa Ramanujam(Bhuvaneshwari). Mohan Ram(Audi Car Owner). Vinod Sagar(Rowdy)

Language Tamil.

Producer Fathima Vijay Antony.

Production Vijay Antony Corporation.
